problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, D is a point in △ABC, CD bisects ∠ACB, BD ⊥ CD, ∠A = ∠ABD, if AC = N_0, BC = N_1, then the length of CD is ()
raw_answer: 解:延长BD,与AC交于点E,∵CD平分∠ACB,∴∠ACD=∠BCD,∵BD⊥CD,∴∠BDC=∠EDC=90°,在△BCD和△ECD中,≥ft\lbrace\begin{array}{l}{∠BCD=∠ECD}\\{CD=CD}\\{∠BDC=∠EDC=90^{°}}\end{array}\right.,∴△BCD≌△ECD(ASA),∴BC=EC=3,BD=DE,∵∠A=∠ABE,∴AE=BE=AC-EC=AC-BC=5-3=2,∴BD=1,在Rt△BDC中,BD=1,BC=3,根据勾股定理得:CD=√{3^{2}-1^{2}}=2√{2}．故选:C．
